frame.name: Extreme_point
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> that has characteristics which change over time is at a point or in a phase of its development in which, compared to other actual or expected stages of development, it possesses extremely high or low powers or intensity. The high or low level of development correlates with the occurrence of a <fen>Marker</fen>, a product produced by the <fen>Entity</fen> or an event in which it participates, which is indicative of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s abilities or intensity.
<ex><fex name="Marker">The Tang Dynasty</fex> <m>was</m> the <t>high point</t> <fex name="Entity">of the Silk Road's importance</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Marker">Meeting Fiona Bennett</fex> <m>was</m> the <t>LOW POINT</t> <fex name="Entity">of my summer</fex>.</ex>
<ex>It must be remembered that this man was born at the <fex name="Marker"><t>zenith</t></fex> <fex name="Entity">of the Victorian age</fex> and witnessed the glory of Britain at her greatest.</ex>
<ex>But Lubitsch was at the <fex name="Marker"><t>high point</t></fex> <fex name="Entity">of his genius</fex>, and he has made a masterpiece not to be missed.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>An concrete or abstract entity that possesses characteristics that change over time.
<ex>Midway was the <t>ZENITH</t> <fex name="ent">of Japanese military advancements</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Marker
FE.definition:
<def-root>A point or phase in time when, viewed across the actual or expected development, the <fen>Entity</fen>'s powers have reached an extreme high or low point. The point or phase is often identified metonymically by reference to a product created by the <fen>Entity</fen> or an event involving the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Marker">Watergate</fex> <m>was</m> the <t>ZENITH</t> of American investigative journalism.</ex> </def-root>
